Comment: While I don't support this type of behavior. I say don't get upset and give the idiots what they want.  Someone is being an asshat, pull up a chair and some popcorn and laugh at them for their stupidity. Nothing in my experience pisses off bullies and those who would insult you more than to laugh in their face and at least act like it doesn't bother you.
